TopicTitle: looking for coordinates of the planets

Articles.Content:
Greetings! I'm looking for method or smth that will give me a coordinates of planets.

Actually i need a distance between active ship and target. Like a vessel.GetSrfVelocity().

Thank you for your answers!
CelestialBody has a position property. FlightGlobals.Bodies[index_of_planet].position might be what you want?

Yes, exactly! I made an unaccurate example with GetSrfVelocity(sorry) because i was looking for vector3d;

Thank you a lot!
